49 {
51 void MotionPlanningFrame::detectObjectsButtonClicked()
52 {
53  if (!semantic_world_)
54  {
55  const planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO& ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO();
56  if (ps)
57  {
58  semantic_world_ = std::make_shared<moveit::semantic_world::SemanticWorld>(ps);
59  }
60  if (semantic_world_)
61  {
62  semantic_world_->addTableCallback(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::updateTables, this));
63  }
64  }
65  planning_display_->addBackgroundJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::triggerObjectDetection, this),
66  "detect objects");
67 }
68 
69 void MotionPlanningFrame::processDetectedObjects()
70 {
71  pick_object_name_.clear();
72 
73  std::vector<std::string> object_ids;
74  double min_x = ui_->roi_center_x->value() - ui_->roi_size_x->value() / 2.0;
75  double min_y = ui_->roi_center_y->value() - ui_->roi_size_y->value() / 2.0;
76  double min_z = ui_->roi_center_z->value() - ui_->roi_size_z->value() / 2.0;
77 
78  double max_x = ui_->roi_center_x->value() + ui_->roi_size_x->value() / 2.0;
79  double max_y = ui_->roi_center_y->value() + ui_->roi_size_y->value() / 2.0;
80  double max_z = ui_->roi_center_z->value() + ui_->roi_size_z->value() / 2.0;
81 
82  ros::Time start_time = ros::Time::now();
83  while (object_ids.empty() && ros::Time::now() - start_time <= ros::Duration(3.0))
84  {
85  // collect all objects in region of interest
86  {
87  const planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO& ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO();
88  const collision_detection::WorldConstPtr& world = ps->getWorld();
89  object_ids.clear();
90  for (const auto& object : *world)
91  {
92  const auto& position = object.second->pose_.translation();
93  if (position.x() >= min_x && position.x() <= max_x && position.y() >= min_y && position.y() <= max_y &&
94  position.z() >= min_z && position.z() <= max_z)
95  {
96  object_ids.push_back(object.first);
97  }
98  }
99  if (!object_ids.empty())
100  break;
101  }
102  ros::Duration(0.5).sleep();
103  }
104 
105  ROS_DEBUG("Found %d objects", (int)object_ids.size());
106  updateDetectedObjectsList(object_ids);
107 }
108 
109 void MotionPlanningFrame::selectedDetectedObjectChanged()
110 {
111  QList<QListWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->detected_objects_list->selectedItems();
112  if (sel.empty())
113  {
114  ROS_INFO("No objects to select");
115  return;
116  }
117  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRW();
118  std_msgs::ColorRGBA pick_object_color;
119  pick_object_color.r = 1.0;
120  pick_object_color.g = 0.0;
121  pick_object_color.b = 0.0;
122  pick_object_color.a = 1.0;
123 
124  if (ps)
125  {
126  if (!selected_object_name_.empty())
127  ps->removeObjectColor(selected_object_name_);
128  selected_object_name_ = sel[0]->text().toStdString();
129  ps->setObjectColor(selected_object_name_, pick_object_color);
130  }
131 }
132 
133 void MotionPlanningFrame::detectedObjectChanged(QListWidgetItem* /*item*/)
134 {
135 }
136 
137 void MotionPlanningFrame::triggerObjectDetection()
138 {
139  if (!object_recognition_client_)
140  {
141  object_recognition_client_ =
142  std::make_unique<actionlib::SimpleActionClient<object_recognition_msgs::ObjectRecognitionAction>>(
143  OBJECT_RECOGNITION_ACTION, false);
144  try
145  {
146  waitForAction(object_recognition_client_, nh_, ros::Duration(3.0), OBJECT_RECOGNITION_ACTION);
147  }
148  catch (std::exception& ex)
149  {
150  ROS_ERROR("Object recognition action: %s", ex.what());
151  return;
152  }
153  }
154  object_recognition_msgs::ObjectRecognitionGoal goal;
155  object_recognition_client_->sendGoal(goal);
156  if (!object_recognition_client_->waitForResult())
157  {
158  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Object recognition client returned early");
159  }
160  if (object_recognition_client_->getState() != actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
161  {
162  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Fail: " << object_recognition_client_->getState().toString() << ": "
163  << object_recognition_client_->getState().getText());
164  }
165 }
166 
167 void MotionPlanningFrame::listenDetectedObjects(const object_recognition_msgs::RecognizedObjectArrayPtr& /*msg*/)
168 {
169  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
170  planning_display_->addMainLoopJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::processDetectedObjects, this));
171 }
172 
173 void MotionPlanningFrame::updateDetectedObjectsList(const std::vector<std::string>& object_ids)
174 {
175  ui_->detected_objects_list->setUpdatesEnabled(false);
176  bool old_state = ui_->detected_objects_list->blockSignals(true);
177  ui_->detected_objects_list->clear();
178  {
179  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < object_ids.size(); ++i)
180  {
181  QListWidgetItem* item =
182  new QListWidgetItem(QString::fromStdString(object_ids[i]), ui_->detected_objects_list, (int)i);
183  item->setToolTip(item->text());
184  Qt::ItemFlags flags = item->flags();
185  flags &= ~(Qt::ItemIsUserCheckable);
186  item->setFlags(flags);
187  ui_->detected_objects_list->addItem(item);
188  }
189  }
190  ui_->detected_objects_list->blockSignals(old_state);
191  ui_->detected_objects_list->setUpdatesEnabled(true);
192  if (!object_ids.empty())
193  ui_->pick_button->setEnabled(true);
194 }
195 
197 void MotionPlanningFrame::updateTables()
198 {
199  ROS_DEBUG("Update table callback");
200  planning_display_->addBackgroundJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::publishTables, this), "publish tables");
201 }
202 
203 void MotionPlanningFrame::publishTables()
204 {
205  semantic_world_->addTablesToCollisionWorld();
206  planning_display_->addMainLoopJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::updateSupportSurfacesList, this));
207 }
208 
209 void MotionPlanningFrame::selectedSupportSurfaceChanged()
210 {
211  QList<QListWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->support_surfaces_list->selectedItems();
212  if (sel.empty())
213  {
214  ROS_INFO("No tables to select");
215  return;
216  }
217  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRW();
218  std_msgs::ColorRGBA selected_support_surface_color;
219  selected_support_surface_color.r = 0.0;
220  selected_support_surface_color.g = 0.0;
221  selected_support_surface_color.b = 1.0;
222  selected_support_surface_color.a = 1.0;
223 
224  if (ps)
225  {
226  if (!selected_support_surface_name_.empty())
227  ps->removeObjectColor(selected_support_surface_name_);
228  selected_support_surface_name_ = sel[0]->text().toStdString();
229  ps->setObjectColor(selected_support_surface_name_, selected_support_surface_color);
230  }
231 }
232 
233 void MotionPlanningFrame::updateSupportSurfacesList()
234 {
235  double min_x = ui_->roi_center_x->value() - ui_->roi_size_x->value() / 2.0;
236  double min_y = ui_->roi_center_y->value() - ui_->roi_size_y->value() / 2.0;
237  double min_z = ui_->roi_center_z->value() - ui_->roi_size_z->value() / 2.0;
238 
239  double max_x = ui_->roi_center_x->value() + ui_->roi_size_x->value() / 2.0;
240  double max_y = ui_->roi_center_y->value() + ui_->roi_size_y->value() / 2.0;
241  double max_z = ui_->roi_center_z->value() + ui_->roi_size_z->value() / 2.0;
242  std::vector<std::string> support_ids = semantic_world_->getTableNamesInROI(min_x, min_y, min_z, max_x, max_y, max_z);
243  ROS_INFO("%d Tables in collision world", (int)support_ids.size());
244 
245  ui_->support_surfaces_list->setUpdatesEnabled(false);
246  bool old_state = ui_->support_surfaces_list->blockSignals(true);
247  ui_->support_surfaces_list->clear();
248  {
249  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < support_ids.size(); ++i)
250  {
251  QListWidgetItem* item =
252  new QListWidgetItem(QString::fromStdString(support_ids[i]), ui_->support_surfaces_list, (int)i);
253  item->setToolTip(item->text());
254  Qt::ItemFlags flags = item->flags();
255  flags &= ~(Qt::ItemIsUserCheckable);
256  item->setFlags(flags);
257  ui_->support_surfaces_list->addItem(item);
258  }
259  }
260  ui_->support_surfaces_list->blockSignals(old_state);
261  ui_->support_surfaces_list->setUpdatesEnabled(true);
262 }
263 
265 void MotionPlanningFrame::pickObjectButtonClicked()
266 {
267  QList<QListWidgetItem*> sel = ui_->detected_objects_list->selectedItems();
268  QList<QListWidgetItem*> sel_table = ui_->support_surfaces_list->selectedItems();
269 
270  std::string group_name = planning_display_->getCurrentPlanningGroup();
271  if (sel.empty())
272  {
273  ROS_INFO("No objects to pick");
274  return;
275  }
276  pick_object_name_[group_name] = sel[0]->text().toStdString();
277 
278  if (!sel_table.empty())
279  support_surface_name_ = sel_table[0]->text().toStdString();
280  else
281  {
282  if (semantic_world_)
283  {
284  const planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO& ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO();
285  if (ps->getWorld()->hasObject(pick_object_name_[group_name]))
286  {
287  geometry_msgs::Pose object_pose(tf2::toMsg(ps->getWorld()->getTransform(pick_object_name_[group_name])));
288  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Finding current table for object: " << pick_object_name_[group_name]);
289  support_surface_name_ = semantic_world_->findObjectTable(object_pose);
290  }
291  else
292  support_surface_name_.clear();
293  }
294  else
295  support_surface_name_.clear();
296  }
297  ROS_INFO("Trying to pick up object %s from support surface %s", pick_object_name_[group_name].c_str(),
298  support_surface_name_.c_str());
299  planning_display_->addBackgroundJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::pickObject, this), "pick");
300 }
301 
302 void MotionPlanningFrame::placeObjectButtonClicked()
303 {
304  QList<QListWidgetItem*> sel_table = ui_->support_surfaces_list->selectedItems();
305  std::string group_name = planning_display_->getCurrentPlanningGroup();
306 
307  if (!sel_table.empty())
308  support_surface_name_ = sel_table[0]->text().toStdString();
309  else
310  {
311  support_surface_name_.clear();
312  ROS_ERROR("Need to specify table to place object on");
313  return;
314  }
315 
316  ui_->pick_button->setEnabled(false);
317  ui_->place_button->setEnabled(false);
318 
319  std::vector<const moveit::core::AttachedBody*> attached_bodies;
320  const planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO& ps = planning_display_->getPlanningSceneRO();
321  if (!ps)
322  {
323  ROS_ERROR("No planning scene");
324  return;
325  }
326  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = ps->getCurrentState().getJointModelGroup(group_name);
327  if (jmg)
328  ps->getCurrentState().getAttachedBodies(attached_bodies, jmg);
329 
330  if (attached_bodies.empty())
331  {
332  ROS_ERROR("No bodies to place");
333  return;
334  }
335 
336  geometry_msgs::Quaternion upright_orientation;
337  upright_orientation.w = 1.0;
338 
339  // Else place the first one
340  place_poses_.clear();
341  place_poses_ = semantic_world_->generatePlacePoses(support_surface_name_, attached_bodies[0]->getShapes()[0],
342  upright_orientation, 0.1);
343  planning_display_->visualizePlaceLocations(place_poses_);
344  place_object_name_ = attached_bodies[0]->getName();
345  planning_display_->addBackgroundJob(boost::bind(&MotionPlanningFrame::placeObject, this), "place");
346 }
347 
348 void MotionPlanningFrame::pickObject()
349 {
350  std::string group_name = planning_display_->getCurrentPlanningGroup();
351  ui_->pick_button->setEnabled(false);
352  if (pick_object_name_.find(group_name) == pick_object_name_.end())
353  {
354  ROS_ERROR("No pick object set for this group");
355  return;
356  }
357  if (!support_surface_name_.empty())
358  {
359  move_group_->setSupportSurfaceName(support_surface_name_);
360  }
361  if (move_group_->pick(pick_object_name_[group_name]))
362  {
363  ui_->place_button->setEnabled(true);
364  }
365 }
366 
367 void MotionPlanningFrame::placeObject()
368 {
369  move_group_->place(place_object_name_, place_poses_);
370  return;
371 }
372 } // namespace moveit_rviz_plugin
